news.title: News
news.information1: Hi guys, this webpage is main to help you to have better experience in meme heroes with the tools provided.
news.information2: Currently the develop progress for this webpage will be greatly affect due to limited time I have for developing this webpage.
news.toMenuGuide: Click the "Menu" button below or "≡" at the bottom right conner to access menu page.
news.v3.5b: IMPORTANT!! on 19/11/2023, this webpage will be down again to shift the cloud service to github hosting.
news.v3.1b: Rework on the whole UI and reimplement all the tools codes.
news.v3.0b: Fixed bug which causing the webpage keep refresh, and planing to rework on the UI and reimplement background codes.
news.v2.5b: IMPORTANT!! on 10/10/2023, this webpage will be down until futher notice!
news.v2.3b: Vitalia planner is up and stable, whooray!!!!
news.v2.0b: Vitalia planner is up and running, still have some bug need to fix....
news.v1.2b: Modify the exp calculation, as of my own testing, it should be slightly more accurate than previous version.
news.v1.0b: Whooray!!! The first stable version is out, no further tools will be added as of current plan until all tools is stable and good to go.
news.Beta: Added vitalia calculator and fixed huge lag when using exp calculator, and added better UI.
news.Alpha: Finally able to setup the server properly, now the tools is up and running, whooray!!
news.pageEnd:
(O3O)r ····· ♡
This is end of news, nothing more but a heart for you

about.title: About
about.author: Night
about.specialThanks: 雪琪，喵喵的猫，尊不是蹲 and many more

news.title: 公告
news.information1: 大家安安，欢迎来到暴走英雄坛工具网页，此网站提供了一些此游戏的计算工具。
news.information2: 此网站还在开发当中，由于我在现实较为繁忙，导致目前网站开发速度较为缓慢。
news.toMenuGuide: 点击下方的 "目录" 按钮或者右下角的 "≡" 按钮前往目录。
news.v3.5b: 注意!! 从19/11/2023开始, 此网站将会下线直到网站成功移植到新平台。
news.v3.0b: 发现并修复了从BETA版本开始就出现的网页重复刷新问题，并着手编写新UI和更动底层代码。
news.v2.5b: 注意!! 从10/10/2023开始, 此网站的所有工具将会下线直到另行通知。
news.v2.3b: 修复上版本真元模拟器的BUG。
news.v2.0b: 真元模拟器上线，现在已着手开始修复已知的BUG。
news.v1.2b: 修改潜能计算器的计算公式。
news.v1.0b: 第一版较为稳定的版本终于释出，目前暂未打算新加其他工具。
news.Beta: 添加真元计算工具，并修复已知BUG。
news.pageEnd:
(O3O)r ····· ♡
到底了，感谢支持，送你一颗爱心。
